1.content:
Roni groaned as sunlight flooded through his window. Opening his brown eyes, the 16 year old stretched his body before sitting up and scratching his messy hair.

"Man, yesterday's trip really tired me out."

While it seems Roni maybe went on a say...hiking trip. He in actuality went on one of his voyages into the world of his anime, hanging out in the awesome world he loved to watch. He had visited the My Hero Academia world and got to watch the sports festival from the crowd! It was awesome and it was more intense to see all the quirks so up close.

"Woof!"

Roni smiled as he crawled to the foot of his bed, on the floor was a comfy doggy bed was a pug. "Hey Zed, morning bud." The wizard leaned down and rubbed the doggo's head before it relaxed and layed on his penguin toy.

The young man soon threw of his covers and started getting ready. Taking a shower, Roni then threw on some grey sweatpants and a pokeball tshirt. Despite his magical powers, Roni still couldn't probably brush his thick spiky hair down.

Standing in the center of his room, Roni rose his hand and spun his finger. A purple magical circle with multiple unrecognizable letters decorating it started to form. Multiple orbs appeared before the magical circle. Inside all of them was a scene from a anime.

Roni was going on another one of his anime adventures. This one would be different as his size magic would come into play. He's experienced this type of journey before, such as when he visited the pokemon world, so small that Pikachu could hold him in his furry palm.

The circle began to glow and Roni was prepared to go.

The question is will he be going alone, or perhaps have a friend with him?
1.title: The Plans For An Adventure

11.content:
Roni had a few friends that do enjoy going on tiny adventures with him. However, with high school over most of them were either working or trying to deal with college.

The wizard was going solo it seemed, oh well maybe he'll have company another time. Now he just needed to pick a world to enter before shrinking down.

The thousands of orbs depicting anime scenes filled Roni with excitement. He made sure to keep his phone on hand in case someone called, luckily signals reached across the dimensions.

"Okay.....now where should I go. Maybe some where familar or new! There's lot of hot guys to have looming over, but so little time."

Roni soon summoned a orb and watched as it fused with the magical circle and crafted a portal.

"Awesome!", Roni excitedly yelled before flushing as he saw Zed looking at him with amusement on his puggy face. He chuckled and rubbed the back of his head "Hehe...sorry buddy, it's still cool everytime I open the gate."

Giving a quick goodbye to his dog, Roni hopped into the portal. The brunette boy watched in awe as he soared through a stream of sparkling blue light. This was the tunnel between worlds that only wizards could open.

Roni soon felt tingly as he changed his size to that of one inch, he soon saw the end of the tunnel ahead. Soon Roni would be in the world.

Which anime world did he go to?

1151.content:
The room Roni came out in was an enormous bedroom of sorts. It was quite dark and lit only by a few lamps, it had a bookcase with several books lining the shelves. A bed which could've held more than a hundred Ronis of the same size loomed overhead.

Roni gulped, "This atmosphere, the dim lights and gothic looking aesthetic..did I end up in the Zoldyck mansion?"

Roni of course would get his answer when the bedroom door swung open to reveal the white haired titan himself: Killua Zoldyck!

Roni's jaw was on the floor as the boy was an absolutely massive titan heading towards him! The giant was dressed in his usual attire, and what's more...he was visibly sweaty!

He had his hands in his pockets as he strode casually across the room. He was unaware the effect his footfalls were having on a tiny individual below. The floor seemed to quake beneath the purple sneakers, Roni was drooling by now at how HUGE and powerful those covered feet seemed.

The titanic assassin boy flopped on his bed and sighed, "What a day...I wonder what Gon's doing right now." The giant's voice rumbled.

Roni couldn't help himself anymore, he raced towards those feet, using his magic to give himself extra speed.

"Darn, my feet are sore...heh...I ain't changed my socks in a few weeks. I wonder how bro would react if I stuffed em' in his pillowcase." Killua snickered to himself as he reached down...
1151.title: The Zoldyck Estate...Uh Oh!

11511.content:
Killua sat up stretching his arms to let his sweaty pits breath, sighing the Zoldyck boy tapped his feet creating light booms that knocked Roni onto his back. The tiny groaned rubbing his back before his eyes widened as Killua stepped onto the heel of his shoe.

"You guys have been baking for too long, time to let loose!", pulling on his foot with a considerable amount of force Killua's sweaty socked cloth foot started to peel off the insole. "Hey come on it's time to come out", Killua grunted as he tugged on his foot and with a POP the foot came out.

Roni looked in amazement, Killua's large feet looked to have a painted on sock as the sweat smeared acros the sole of the foot. A heavy scent suddenly filled the air as Killua's foot let out a strong potent stink, like that of funky cheese odor. The cheesy socked foot soon rested on the heel looming high above the shrunken wizard and blasting Roni with the bittersweet fumes

With the same difficulty, Killua took his other shoe off now having both feet free. The white haired boy chuckled as he wiggled his large toes through the socks, tiny squelchs rang out as the large gallons of sweat smooshed against the socks.

Killua chuckled as he slid the sneakers pouring out odor aside. Grabbing the hem of his the Zoldyck grinned as he began to peel of the sweat filled sock. "Alright you better not stick like the shoes hehe."

The sound of a sticker peeling rang out as the white cloth, the fabric had somewhat adhired due to the tremendous sweat build up over Killua's activities. The cheddary idor hit Roni and had him sniff it up eagerly as the heavy stench floated the air. The plump soles dripped drops of sweat to the ground, letting out burst of the warm vinegar cheese.

Roni looked up in amazement as both soles came down, producing loud slaps as the plump sweaty feet hit the ground. The large toes rested before him, the big toe being bigger then him as with each wiggle a cheddary overload from the lint filled toes.

Killua sighed. "That's better, nice do air these digs out!"

The Zoldyck then....

Roni gazed in awe and curiosity at Killua's large feet. The socks plastered tightly because of the flesh so tight you could see killua's pale flesh beyond some areas of the fabric. Thick drops of sweat plunged all around roni as killua pulled off his socks one Landing on him and soaking him with a cheesy taste to it. Killua unsuspectingly flattened his sole flattening roni below he cheesy, musky appendage Roni was suffocated by the seeping stench and the dry and sticky sweat intruding on him from all corners, even into his mouth. He could almost taste the journeys killua's feet witnessed with gon and the others. He squirmed to try get free and reached the toes, large lint coated ones, killua was texting gon and felt roni's movements by his toes tickling him he scrunched his toes wrapping roni and drenching him further. Roni was pushed back under the sole and became stuck to the foot. Killua tilted his foot up and waved it around whilst flexing his toes inviting the rooms fresh air to fight against his grimy foot stench Roni plastered on the sole like a bug on the hunter's soft smelly sole.

Killua felt the small mass on his sole and tilted it towards his face and put on a discerning look, "woah. Look how small you are, heh unlucky you ended up below there Haha." Roni chuckled lightly in slight fear as he made eye contact with the assassin. Who licked his lips. What did killua have in mind...
115113.title: Smothered by Killua's sweaty feet!

12.content:
Zed began to bark at Roni's doorway as a fluffy orange fox trotted in. The pug seemed unafraid and even excited to see the creature as they both wagged their tails and sniffed at each other.

"Oh, hey Ren!" Roni cheerfully greeted the random fox. The fox quickly morphed into a boy wearing a green hoodie, with fox ears and a tail. "Heya, Roni! I wanna come on one of your adventures today!" The foxboy's ears wiggled cutely.
Roni smiled, "You sure? It might be scaaary..." Roni teased.

Ren pouted, "So what? I'm a brave foxy!" Zed barked in agreement causing them to laugh.

"Alright alright, just get ready cause we're going small by the time we get there!" Roni smiled as Renard's tail wagged. "Oh boy!"

The circle continued to glow, upon looking closer Ren could see what anime they were destined for...

Spotting two specks by his boot
121.content:
"Fullmetal Alchemist, ahh a classic.", Ren smiled as he put his arms behind his head.

Roni smiled as he readied the portal and formed the dimensional gate. A bork soon drawed the two's attention, looking over Zed was writing in a empty notebook. Pencil in his mouth as he wrote with a pair of glasses on his snout.

"Oh yeah, Zed was working on a fan sequel to the series!"

Ren raised an eyebrow, seeing the doggo write. "Roni...when did Zed start writ- actually when did he learn to write?"

Roni chuckled as he grasped Ren's hand and jumped into the portal. "Fufu, I'll never tell~"

Zed watched as his owner and fellow furry friend left, the pug started humming as he continued writing his magnum opus.

Inside of a hotel room a small white orb flashed, despite being little the orb casted the entire room briefly in a cast of light. Appearing at a inch tall once the light died down where Roni and Ren.

"Man those tunnels are still wild!", Ren wiggled his ears as he adjusted to the new environment.

Roni smiled and looked in awe at all the furniture stretching into the sky. The room was darkened, meaning whoever the giant is that was staying here most likely was out.

The two tinies were by the wall and about to go exploring when a faint tremor was felt. Roni could sense a large figure through his magic waves, Ren had heightened sense and could feel the distant shaking of the ground.

"A giant's coming, oh my Hecate Ren a giant's coming!", Roni began excitingly shaking Ren's shoulders and subsequently his whole torso.

"Ah..yesss...I can...sense itttt!", Ren yelped as he was shook.

The door to the hotel soon opened and both of the tinies looked in awe at the giant standing in the doorway. It was Edward Elric, standing tall (or short) like a mountain.

Stomping over to the bed, the red soles of Ed's boots shook the ground before he sat on the bed. Ed huffed with an annoyed look as he pulled off his black jacket.

The metal of his automail arm seem to glisten with sweat coating it as trails of the liquid traveled from Ed's body to the metal.

"Grh can't believe the colonel basterd had me out in the desert! The philosopher stone was just a hoax.", Ed leaned onto his knees as he brooded over his waste of time.

Roni and Ren slowly walked closer, soon stopping next to the large boot. A strange scent soon hit then from Ed looming above, a distinct b.o smell from the numerous trails of sweat going down the alchemist's toned arms and chest. Ed's bangs were sticking to his forehead as from the steamy liquid.

Ed sighed before.....
121.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

choices: Ed Prepares to Stomp Them With That Sweaty Foot!
1212.content:
"Hm?" Ed's golden eyes locked on to the two specks by his boot, causing Roni and Ren to freeze and shiver at the cold look.
"Uhh...Roni...I think he sees us!" Ren gulped. "Really?! Oh boy! I wonder how he'll react to us being so small...especially in comparison to him!"

Edward's 'antennae' stood straight up. The blonde's eyes narrowed, "I get the feeling someone just called me short."

Who knew the elder Elric had an ESP for 'short' comments! A devious grin formed on Ed's face as he lifted his gargantuan boot above the two specks, "I may get called that...but at least I'm not short as you two bugs!" The alchemist's voice boomed as the red treads began to come down.

"RUN!" Renard yelped as he dragged the now drooling Roni behind him. The boot came down with what could very well be described as an earthquake, the whole room seemed to shake for Roni and Ren.

"Damn, little bugs are fast!" Ed's voice rumbled as he reached for his boots.

A sickeningly wet POP emitted from behind the running tinies. And an enormous object flew overhead and slammed down in front of them, blocking their path with a wall of leather.

"Hah! Cornered ya!" Ed cackled as his barefoot slapped against the floor upon standing up...the giant was now approaching!

"Eewwwww...." Ren covered his nose at the steamy fumes coming out of the giant boot before them.

"Haaaaawt..." Roni drooled as he stepped toward the fuming insides.

"Roniiii! Can't you telepathically tell him we're not bugs or something!?" Ren panicked as Ed's shadow overtook them. The cocky blond had his hands on his hips and wore a cheeky grin.

He flexed his bare and plump toes at them, enjoying watching them squirm on his foot fumes.

12121.content:
Roni glanced between Ren and the large sole hanging over them, he had a concentrated look as he closed his eyes. He soon looked at the foxboy with a serious look.

"....You know we could probably survive getting stomped.", the wizard pouted as he rubbed his chin.

Ren facepalmed at his friend's current mindset. He suddenly widened his eyes as the shadow darkened, the cause being Ed was beginning to lower his plump smelly sole.

"I think it's time to crush you ants!", Ed chuckled as he slowly stepped down towards the "bugs".

Ren scrunched his nose before looking at Roni looking up with sparkling eyes. The foxboy groaned as he snapped his fingers and made a flicker of blue fire flash in front of the wizard, getting his attention.

"Telepathy.....please!"

Roni sighed but put a hand on his head as a magical circle grew on his forehead.

Ed plopped his heel on the floor, he smirked as he started lowering his sole. He was about to feel two tiny bodies get smooshed under his foot, when a sudden strange airy feeling came to his head.

"U-um were not bugs! Could you please not squish us.....for now at least."

Ed whipped his head around the room looking for the strange voice. "What the hell! Who said that?"

"Down here."

The blond giant quirked an eyebrow before tilting his still propped up sole. Ed narrowed his eyes as he looked at the two bugs he's had yet to crush. He suddenly widened his eyes in surprise as the bugs looked both humanoid and wore cloths.

Ed soon placed his foot back next to the other before suddenly kneeling down and lowering his body to look closer at the tinies.

Ren was relieved as he no longer had the alchemist's large and chessy foot hanging over him and Roni. While the foot odor was slightly gone, it was joined by a new musky stench. Ed's b.o was coming off strong due to the heat and sweat he had drenched in.

"What the...how?", Ed was at a lose of words at the two tinies before him.

Roni smiled before waving. "Uh...hello, I know that this may be strange but we can explain!"

Ed slowly grinned as he looked between Roni and Ren. "It's....incredible, I never seen anything like this!"

The wizard and foxboy smiled at Ed's reaction, discovering a new phenomenon in his world of science.

Ed suddenly reached forward and grabbed both of the tinies in a fist. Roni looked in awe as they still had room in the enclosed hand, like a warm soft chamber. Ren hummed as he relaxed on the cushiony palm.

The alchemist walked back over to the bed, his feet making wet slaps with his steps. Ed soon sat down and brought his hand to his face, opening it to find the two sitting on his palm.

"So who are you guys?", Ed asked with curiosity.

Roni looked to Ren and nodded. "Well...I'm Roni and this is Ren, and......werefromadifferentworldandimawizard!", the wizard quickly said as his mind went blank on how to explain everything.

Ed blinked. "Uh...what?"

Ren sighed before sitting up. "What he meant to say was is, we're from another world. The reason were tiny is because this spike head can do things that your world can't allow. Things like magic."

Ed hummed with a thoughtful look. "That's a lot to take in, I gotta say it's cool that i met another world's inhabitants by almost stepping on them!", Ed chuckled as he pictured himself triumphantly standing on the two.

Edward noticed the two weren't exactly looking up at his face. Following the foxboy's eyes, his grin stayed in place as he saw that the fluffy boy was staring directly at the sweat stained underarm of his undershirt. Testing this, he slightly peeled his pit from his side, opening it ever so slightly.

The foxboy grinned as he saw a large school in the orb, adorned with skulls and having numerous steps leading to it. "Aw sweet Soul Eater!"

Roni nodded and hummed as he fused the orb and created the portal gate. The wizard's room became illuminated by the blue glow of the sparkling gate, a strange breeze rustled his curtains and posters.

Ren chuckled at the excited tone before stretching. "That sounds cool and everything, we can talk about it later but I think we're here."

The two soon reached the end of the dimensional tunnel and were enveloped in white light. As the light faded, Roni and Ren found themselves sitting on a floor service. The real site was the side of a couch stretching into the sky like a skyscraper.

"Whistle damn never knew how normal things look to a bug.", Ren looked around the new environment in awe at the giant size of everything.

A sudden shaking had the two look to each other. The ground shook like that of rhythmic steps, carrying the form of this home's giant inhabitant.

"The portal should have dropped in the house of one of the main characters, so let's get ready!"

Finally, with a squishy noise..the sock flew off and discolored lint flew everywhere...like a cheddary snowstorm it rained down on Roni. Roni grabbed one of them and dug his nose into it before giving it a taste. He shivered in pleasure as Ren arrived at the top of the table..just in time to see Roni begin EATING the grimey fluff.

"Ewww!" Ren groaned, he pinched his nose as Soul set to work on his other sock. Soul's toes were round and bulbous, perfectly shaped and completely clogged with sock lint.

"This is so awesome..." Roni swooned. The other sock came off in the same fashion, Soul absentmindedly dropped the wet socks...directly on top of Ren and Roni on the table!
122111.title: Setting those Feet Free

choices: Soul spots movement from the sock
Soul continues airing his feet out
1221112.content:
Soul let out a satisfied sigh as he wiggled his lint filled toes and flexed his meaty sole. "Ah that's better, take a good breather guys I know you got lots of odor to go around!"

The weapon grinned with his sharp teeth as he felt his large feet emit their powerful chesse fumes. Soul closed his eyes and felt his whole body relax, blissfully unaware of the two tinies he's imprisoned in stink.

Roni meanwhile pressed his nose against the damp sock, humming as the funky stench tingled his nostrils. It was like they were in a tent, one loaded with the mighty odors of Soul's smelly feet.

Ren meanwhile was muffling his coughs with his hoodie as the strong and mighty stench still hit his nose. The foxboy couldn't help but cringe as Roni sniffed and began licking the crusty gunk glued to the fabric.

"Cough! Roni seriously dude to you have to do that?!"

The wizard swallowed the chessy gunk and rubbed his head. "Ren I know it's really stinky but....theres a sort of sweetness to it! Not to mention, the aroma is so powerful that you feel even smaller before Soul's feet."

Little taps could he heard on the top of the sock, this was in fact a hailstorm of toe lint. Brought on as Soul's large toes rubbed against each and let the flops fall to the table and sock.

Roni grinned as the smell seemed to become rejuvenated with the lint droppings. Ren groaned as he attempted to block out the powerful odor even more as Roni blissfully sniffed the chessy air.

Soon...
1221112.title: The Chessy Air

choices: Black*Star Pops His Shoes Off to Unleash His Meaty Bare Feet!
1222.content:
https://i.pinimg.com/originals/ec/ab/0e/...

Roni's eyes widened as the titanic form of the most egotistical and in his opinion macro-potential having character stomped in. "Black*Staaar...." Roni practically drooled.

Renard's eyes widened as he took in the enormous form of the blue haired teen. He was wearing his usual outfit of a black sleeveless vest and white pants as well as those big shoes that had silver toes and a star engraved on them.

"YAHOO!" The voice rumbled down to them, making them clamp their hands over their ears...especially Renard.

"Jeez, he's even louder now that he's a giant!" Ren whined.

"Of course he is!" Roni groaned.

That was when the blue haired ninja took his first stomp into the home. It was almost as if Black*Star knew they were here and was showing off. But of course having seen the anime, they knew he was always trying to be the center of attention...even when nobody was around.

The two tinies bounced up and down from the first stomp's force. The entire room seemed to shake with each forceful step the young Meister was taking.

"I think...WE NEED TO RUN!" Ren yelled out, and for once, Roni agreed. They took off across the floor towards the safety of the couch...only for a shadow to overtake them.

Fortunately this wasn't Black*Star's foot coming to stomp them, as they found out when the humongous boy flopped down, ass first, on the couch they were headed towards. "HAHAHAHAH! I knew I could make it! I'm surprised this couch didn't flatten under someone as BIG as me!" The boy boomed with laughter.

Roni had hearts in his eyes, "He's the perfect macro..."

..What happens now?
1222.title: Black*Star

12222.content:
The spiky ninja stretched out his toned arms as he widely grinned, feeling himself unwind. His attention was brought to his large star marked shoes, he could feel his soles squishing against the insole feeling hot sweat lightly splash.

"Heh alright time to let the BIG boys out!", Reaching down Black*Star roughly grasped the ankle of his boot like shoes.

Roni's eyes sparkled as he hopped in place. "OMG Ren he's taking off his shoes!", the wizard gushed. As the foot lifted up Roni looked at the flat grey sole laced with dirt, bound to hold large feet. Ren sighed in amusement at Roni's fanboying, though he secretly blushed as he saw the underarms of Black*Star, more specifically his blue fuzzy pits.

Black*Star grunted as he started to pull on his shoes, clenching his teeth as it seems his feet cooking in sweat made his sole adhear to the foot. "ARRGH come on i need to show of my BIG feet too!"

With a loud POP the heel of Black*Star's foot dislodged from the show. The ninja let out a loud sigh before grinning as he started to pull of the rest of the shoe. Roni was drooling as first the rough heel was in the sky and then following that the meaty sole was revealed.

Despite his physical activities and high energy, Black*Star's soles were quite plump looking both soft and meaty. Sweat was smeared over the sole from the insole absorbing his smelly sweat. The smell was as big as the feet, a thick cheddary odor started to fumigate out into the fresh air and floated down below.

Roni breathed in the stench and sighed. The cheesy fumes was both bitter and sweet, making his nostrils flare as the intoxicating stench hung around the tinies like a fog. Renard meanwhile gagged as he pulled his hoodie over his mouth, this was totally different from pits! The cheese was highly potent as the giant blue haired ninja flexed his plump sole getting drops to fall down and splash like buckets.

Black*Star let out a booming laugh as he pulled off the shoe, tossing it aside to shake up the ground for the tinies. "HAHAHA! That feels real good!", leaning down and taking a sniff of his odorous foot, the ninja closed his eyes and grinned. "Sure build up a sweat today stomping out those pathetic bugs! Sure was an honor to get crushed by the great me HAHA!"

Ren groaned as he clamped his ears shut all while Roni was ogling at the "perfect giant material" as he calls it. Black*Star soon took off his other shoe, increasing the faul cheddary funk in the air.

Loud wet slaps boomed as Black*Star stomped both his meaty, sweaty feet down in front of the tinies. Roni was 5 seconds from running in as he watched the truck sized toes wiggling and heating up the linty gunk between them.

"Huh, what the?!"

Looking up, Roni and Ren widened their eyes as from above Black*Star was looking right at them! The spiky bluenette had his eyes narrowed and an eyebrow raised.
12222.title: Revealing The Ninja Feet

123.content:
Ren grinned as he saw a young boy and a butler. "Sweet Black Butler! Feeling the Victorian era?"

The wizard smiled as he conjured up a top hat before setting it on Ren's head. The foxboy chuckled as he tipped the hat before it sprang off his head as his fluffy ears popped up.

"Its gonna be hard not having internet, but getting to explore the Phantomhive world is worth it!", Roni jokingly clutched his heart before laughing with Ren.

"Alright Presto let's get going.", Ren grinned as he pressed the hat onto Roni's spiky head.

Roni bend down and pet Zed, getting the pug to nuzzle his hand. "See you buddy, don't cause too much havoc!"

"Woof!"

Holding out his hand, Roni soon felt Ren grip it tightly. A blue rip soon appeared as Roni opened the dimensional gate.

"Alright, here we go!"

The wizard and foxboy soon jumped into the portal, the glowing gate soon warped before flashing away in a storm of sparkles. Zed watched his owner and friend leave before sighing, already missing the wizard.

Pawing over to his dog bed, Zed pulled out a black furred jacket. The pug soon crawled under It, a lump shifting. Suddenly the lump grew and the jacket rose to reveal a young man, with black hair, red jeans, and black boots.

Zed grinned as he picked up his penguin plush, setting it on his shoulder. "Have fun master, I'll be there if you ever need help!"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ciel Phantomhive sat in his office, buisness paper in hand and a cup of tea about to be poured by his butler Sebastian.

However, just as Sebastian was about to pour the hot drink he narrowed his eyes suddenly. The demon could sense a strange energy approaching.

"Sebastian what is it?", Ciel asked upon seeing the tall man momentarily freeze.

The butler soon grew one of his smiles. "Ah my lord it seems we have some...otherworldly visitors."

Ciel blinked before frowning. "Pardon?"

Sebastian chuckled as he suddenly held his hand palm up. "Ah a wizard and totem, a while since I've seen their kind."

Before the earl could question Sebastian, a blue circle suddenly flashed in front of the butler and Ciel briefly spotted two specks falling to the gloved palm.

Roni ophed as he fell onto the soft ground. He was confused as he and Ren were supposed to walk out of the portal, not fall from the sky. Looking over to Ren, Roni saw him laying on the soft ground nonchalantly looking at the giant casting a shadow.

The wizard looked in awe as the demonic butler Sebastian Michaelis was looming over holding him and Ren in the palm of his hand.

Sebastian coyly grinned. "So you must be our guests! I must say I was not expecting literal small company."

Roni was lost in ooggiling land as Sebastian brought his palm down to Ciel's desk. Ren sighed as he threw Roni over his shoulder and stepped off the gloved hand. The wizard soon snapped out of it as Ren set him down.

Ciel looked down in surprise at the two tinies before him. He had encountered strange anomalies but inch tall tiny people was a new.

"What on earth, who are you and how did you appear out of nowhere?", Ciel looked both in suspicion and curiosity between the two.

Roni grinned. "Well my names Roni and this is Ren."

"Yo.", Ren flashed a peace sign.

"The reason we showed up here is because.....we wanna study here!"

Ciel raised an eyebrow. "You what?

"We what?", Ren whispered looking over looking over. The wizard sent him a grin and nod, denting some assurance.

Roni nodded. "We come from the future and wanted to try experiencing life in this time period."

Ciel kept his eye on the two tinies, staring intensely at them with his merciless might. He finally blinked and looked up to his butler. "Is what he's saying true Sebastian?"

The butler chuckled. "He is not from this time my lord, perhaps he is being genuine."

The earl sighed before looking back down, opening his mouth confused as the two tinies had gotten on their knees and had their heads bowed.

"If you are being truthful, then I will allow you runts to stay here."

The two suddenly jumped in the air sparkles surrounding them as they grasped hands and twirled. Both had looks of joy as they cheered.

"On these conditions!", Ciel slammed his hand to the desk, shaking up the tinies before they quickly got back on their knees.

"If you are going to live in my manor then you must earn your keep. Your size is not an excuse, if I ask you to complete a task you will complete it, understand!"

"YES MY LORD!", the wizard and foxboy bowed in sync.

"My my, they've adapted quickly.", Sebastian thought as he watched the tinies amusement.

Ciel sweatdropped before sighing. "Now then, for someone your sizes I will be giving you personal jobs. Also I want you to spend time explaining the future to me.", a impish grin grew on the earl's face as he leaned forward.

"I want to know what events will befall our world, what new creations are made. If such knowledge is in my hands then the future shall be easy to pave the way for my legacy."

Roni and Ren looked to each other, the two smiled as they had their housing taken care of not to mention getting to interact with this world.

What was up first?
123.title: Black Butler

choices: Ciel Dumps Them Beneath His Desk..Demanding a Foot Rub!
Ciel has Them Do the Paperwork!
1232.content:
"Excellent idea, my lord. I shall entrust these two to your more..advanced education." Sebastian quipped with a smile. Ciel smirked, these two little 'guests' of his could prove quite useful...as well as entertaining.

"Prepare a new pot of tea, Sebastian." Ciel ordered with a sly grin. Sebastian bowed, "Right away my lord, shall I bring two extra cups?"

Ciel chuckled, "I doubt we have any their size." This caused Roni to chime in, "Well I could grow us to nor-"

The Earl interrupted the wizard by waving him off as Sebastian already had departed. "I have business matters to attend to...is what I SHOULD say..but seeing as you two seem to have broke my focus, I suppose I shall divert my attention to you."

Ren couldn't tell if Ciel was relieved to have an excuse not to do his paperwork...or annoyed that they'd interrupted it.

"Well go on...tell me about the future." Ciel jolted Ren out of his thoughts as he fixed his uncovered left eye on the duo.

Roni and Ren shared a nervous look, Roni surely knew what the foxboy was thinking. Whenever they entered an anime or other realm...the utmost care was necessary to not alter the timeline.

Case in point, they were currently in an anime set in Victorian England...so Ciel's request that they simply spill what happens in the future might not be one they could in good conscience follow.

Ciel scowled and jolted them out of their thoughts by slamming his fist on the desk's surface. "I gave you two an order did I not?! Tell me what the future holds!"

"W-well...I'm sorry...we can't, my lord..." Roni said nervously, both boys knew how wicked Ciel could be.

Ciel's uncovered eye narrowed, "Beg your pardon? Are you refusing an order?" The Earl reached his hand over to the two tinies and instantly gripped them in a tight fist.

The two males groaned as it felt like their torsos were being compressed, the Phantomhive brought them to his cold blue eye. "Very well, I suppose I shall have to show you worms your place by giving you a different task....perhaps then you shall give me the information I desire."
1232.title: Rejecting an Earl? Bad Idea...

choices: Roni and Ren rubbed up the sole
12321.content:
The earl smirked as he suddenly started stepping on the heels of his shoes, beginning to pull his feet out of the tight footwear. "Since you ants feel as if you can refuse an order I'll need to educate you on who is in charge starting from the bottom."

With an audible POP, Ciel's large feet slid out of his shoes. The young boy reached down and placed the shoes next to his chair, he then not so gently tossed the two tinies under the desk. Roni yelped as he hit the floor and groaned as Ren landed on him.

"Great we managed to piss off Ciel, now wh- ACK what is that?!", Ren was brought out of his thoughts when a strong scent hit his sensitive nose.

The strong smell was the giant socked foot before them, damp with sweat giving off a vinegary and chesse stench. Up above on Ciel's knee was his other socked foot, the earl sighed as he peeled off his sock feeling the cool air hit his sweaty sole. After bringing up his other foot and peeling off the damp cloth, Ciel smugly smiled as he set his large feet on their heels in front of the two tinies.

Crossing his arms, Ciel sneered. "Since you worms won't give me any information on the future you can at least rub my noble feet while I drink my tea!"

Ren clenched his nose, the two towering soles had drops of sweat running down and more waves of that chessy scent hit with the wiggling of Ciel's toes. Roni however looked in awe at the giant feet, thinking deeply about how smelly they are despite the noble look of Ciel.

"Ants that wasn't a request that was a order. Start rubbing or consider yourselfs my insoles for your stay here!", Ciel scoffed as he raised his large feet and brought them down to shake the tinies up.

Roni quickly sprang into action, pushing his hands into the plump sole and rubbing the heel area. Ren sighed before pulling his hoodie up over his face and walking over to the other foot. While the wizard happily rubbed and sniffed the odorous soles, Ren groaned as he smelt the chessy stench.

Ciel smirked as he took a sip of his tea. "That's right, rub your lord's soles ants!"

Soon...
12321.title: Ciel's Other Task

123211.content:
Ciel smirked as he looked over the paperwork covering his desk. This normally dull part of his routine was made to be quite the event due to the two 'guests' massaging his hard working noble feet! The feeling of power and control, a feeling the young Earl was all too familiar with at some level, was overwhelming.

At least one of the ants down below was NOT having as much fun. It was the foxboy who was struggling to keep the victorian brat's foot stench from beating his nose up. "H-hey, Ciel? I can tell you about the future!" Ren pleaded.

To Ren's distress, the sole in front of him smashed into his face and rubbed its sweat and mushiness into him. "I don't believe I ever gave you permission to call me by my name! I am Lord Phantomhive or 'master' to insects like you!" Ciel haughtily informed the foxboy.

"B-but, Lord Phantomhive...I can tell you all you want!" Ren wailed, desperate to get out of this assault on his nose.

"Really? Good to hear, you can tell me all I want to know AFTER you give me this massage!" Ciel boomed authoritatively.

Ren whined and glared at Roni who was snickering as he glanced over. "Nice try..." Roni chuckled.

"Oh shut up." Ren snapped.

"Less chit chat! More rubbing!" Ciel ordered loudly.
123211.title: Rubbing an Earl's Feet

choices: "Woah! Two Talking Bugs! And they Know My Name!?"
"I Wonder if These Bugs Are Tasty..."
124.content:
Ren and Roni's eyes sparkled as they saw images of a funny looking pirate ship with a ram's head as the figurehead. Roni licked his lips as he saw a young dark haired lad using his visibly wide and plump feet to pummel an enemy.

"I think we have a winner." Ren joked as he noticed Roni staring at Luffy's always-on-display feet. "Yeaah..." Roni practically drooled.

Roni turned around to Zed, to see the pug already had his straw hat on and was sitting there wagging. "Bork!"

"Hehehe, smart boy." Renard crouched down and scratched under the puppy's chin. "Be sure to continue the anime while we're gone! Skip the filler though."

Zed nodded, "Ruff ruff!"

Roni laughed as the straw hat looked so big on the little dog, it practically slid over his eyes. Roni came over and hugged Zed, "Be good, okay? Don't watch too far ahead of where we left off."

Zed made a bit of a whine but nodded once more. "We'll bring you back a treat." Ren said over his shoulder as they went through the portal and were gone.

The puppy soon morphed into a young man, still in the straw hat. A penguin plush hopped on his shoulder and hugged the lad's cheek.

"Hehehe, ready for some One Piece, buddy?" The pug-human asked the living plush.

"Nooty noot!" The plush squawked.

**********

On the other end of the portal, both boys were now crammed together in a pile. "Oww! What the heck?! This doing look like the Going Merry!" Ren said as he tried to shove Roni off of him.

"Jeez, it sounds like we're on the ocean..but what kind of stupid boat is this?!" Roni pushed back.

There was a circular opening above them, they could see the clear blue sky and some clouds above.

"Here, gimme a boost." Roni said as he clambered up onto Ren. "Ow ow ow! Watch it!" Ren yelped as his ears were stepped on.

"My bad. Sooo...we ARE on the ocean." Roni called down.

"Yeah, I figured that by how this stupid boat was rocking back and forth."

"And we're in an old can floating on the water." Roni confirmed, seeing the remains of the label on the outside.

"So that's why it smells like baked beans in here." Ren groaned up to him.

"WHOA! It's the Going Merry!" Roni yelled out in excitement. "What?! Where?!" Ren looked up and started wiggling around.

"It's headed right for us!!" Roni screamed in terror.

"...Oh crap." Ren gulped before screaming as a huge steel hook nearly impaled him through the wall.

"W-woahhhh!" Roni and Ren fell back down to the bottom of the can. They could feel their trash vessel being hoisted into the air, and soon a gigantic black eye was peering in at them.

"Is that...Luffy?" Roni said in awe.

Luffy...
124.title: One Piece

1242.content:
Luffy's eye seem to pop out as he heard the two specks in the can talking! "Woah i didn't know some bugs could talk!"

Ren cringed as he pressed his fox ears to his head, while seeing the pirate captain up close was an amazing sight this was the loud voice of Luffy.

"U-um were not really bugs-WAH!", Roni had began to speak but suddenly yelped as Luffy turned over the can sending him and Ren tumbling onto the warm palm. Luffy grinned toothily as he brought his palm to his face.

"You know my name to, what kinda bugs are you?", the captain eagerly asked slamming his sandaled feet together.

Roni's ahoge sprang up, his feet senses were going off, Ren's ears flicked as he took in the giant before. It was a sunny day with the bright beams hitting the water and a faint of sweaty musk hit the tinies noses.

"Ren follow my lead.", Roni sent a telepathic message to the foxboy, Ren rose and eyebrow but decided to see what the wizard had planned.

"W-well my name is Roni and this is Ren, we came from a really tiny island! Everyone there is the same size as us and don't really go exploring but we decided to try. We ended up losing our raft and had to use the can as a boat...", Roni explained rubbing his head awkwardly.

Luffy looked in awe at the story being told. "Wow so you guys floated around forever in a can?"

Ren chimed in. "Yeah it sucks we were expecting to find someone with a nice scent."

Luffy tilted his head blinking. "Huh your looking for someone who smells?"

"Yeah you see...we really enjoy smelling the odors that others don't appreciate and were kind of glad you found us, we've heard alot about the captain of the Strawhats!", Roni explained.

Luffy hummed before.....
1242.title: Meeting The Giant Captain

1251.content:
"Fairy Tail huh, haven't you've been there before?", Ren said observing the orb with the large guild building.

Roni grinned as he morphed the orb into the sparkling gate. "Yeah but only for a little. We luckily don't have to worry about hiding our powers. Hehe wonder what it'll be like when we see everyone as a giant!"

Zed nuzzled both of the boy's legs, Roni smiled as he rubbed his doggo's head. "Be good Zed, remember only a hour on the switch."

A happy woof was the reply as the pug began pulling out the controller. Ren hummed as he saw Zed starting up Super Smash.

"Hmmm does he main Duck Hunt Dog?", Ren rubbed his chin before widening his eyes as Zed gave what could only be described as a offended look. The foxboy chuckled and put his hands up.

Roni chuckled before grasping Ren's hand. "Come on let's get going!" The two walked into the portal gate, Roni's voice could be heard. "Just so you know, he mains Ridley."

Zed grumbled as he started his round, the portal carrying his owner and friend vanishing.

The wizard and foxboy flowed through the blue shimmering tunnel, heading to the world of Fairy Tail. Roni rubbed his chin as he held up a hand and formed a small purple magic circle.

"You know, we'll have to give our powers names, like everyone in the show. I think I'll call mine...Mirage Glyph!", Roni grinned.

Ren looked over from where he was lounging, the foxboy held up a finger and a blue flame sprouted. "I might just call mine blue fire."

The wizard pouted as he dissolved the circle. "Come on Ren! We can't be basic, well just blend into the back if we don't make a good impression!"

Sighing, Ren flooded over. "First off Roni, I have ears plus a tail and I'm sure if we ever got separated I could find you by looking at the hair of everyone. Second, were going on a tiny adventure. If anyone sees us were bound to either be running or underneath a foot."

Roni's face fell slightly, he had gotten kind of into exploring this world. But a tiny journey was different then a normal one. Ren frowned at his friend's downed mood before smiling and throwing a arm around his shoulder.

"Look we can try going on this guild trip later, for now let's just gaze at some giants.", Roni smiled and nodded at Ren's words.

Ren grinned as he tossed a fire ball between his hands. "You know what, I think I got a name. I'll name my power....Azure Flame."

Roni nodded. "Cool! Hey the end of the tunnels coming."

Soon the two were involved in a bright light and no longer found themselves in the glowing tunnel. At first, it appeared they were on a platform of sorts, stretching for a mile. But upon further inspection, it turns out they were on a giant table!.

"Nice the shrinking spell worked!", Roni fist bumped Ren as the foxboy looked around in awe.

In front of the table was a couch, surrounding it were other messy objects like discarded clothes and food utensils. A loud creak soon rang out as the door to the room opened and booming steps could be heard.

Entering the room was....
1251.title: Fairy Tail

12511.content:
Through the door came a pink haired and muscled teen, his pecs and abs were visible through his shirt opening. His steps made some noise as the black sandals stomped the floor.

"Cool it's Natsu!", Roni grinned but also tried to suppress a blush as he spotted the firm pecs bouncing with his movement.

Roni whistled as they were soon casted in a shadow, Natsu looming over as he stopped before the table.

Natsu hummed as he put his hands on his hips. "Happy's probably still napping, don't wanna wake him up now.", the giant suddenly stretched his arms over his head.

Not only did his toned arms flex, but Natsu's large and steamy armpits were given a chance to breath. The musky odor began to fuse with that of that of the natural B.O coming off Natsu's body. The scent was so strong that it somewhat reached Roni's nose, the wizard smiled as he sniffed the awesome smell.

Ren however let out a BLAGH sound as not only did he smell the b.o, but his stronger nose smelled the sweaty musk even more. Ren looked over and rolled his eyes as he saw Roni blissfully sniffing the fragrance.

"Ah great, he's off in giant dream land."

Natsu suddenly stopped stretching as he rose an eyebrow. A scent hit his nose, beside his mighty body odor Natsu could smell some other people near him.

"Huh what the?", the black eyes of Natsu looked over his pecs and narrowed at two specks below him on the table.

Roni and Ren looked in awe as Natsu began squatting down. Setting his hands on his knees, Natsu's musk spread more as he looked surprised as he saw the specks were in fact tiny humans.

"What the hell!", Natsu gawked loudly, Roni and Ren were thrown to the table at the booming voice, the foxboy winced as he pressed his fluffy ears to his head.

"Who are you...actually why the hell are you guys so damn small?", Natsu asked leaning his head down.

Roni grinned and helped Ren up. "My names Roni! This is my friend Renard."

The foxboy flashed a piece sign. "Yo, call me Ren."

The wizard then rubbed his head. "Umm you see me and Ren are...fans of you, the Salamander of Fairy Tail Natsu Dragneel! My magic let's me control size so we often go on...tiny trips!", Roni quickly made up.

Natsu was still slightly puzzled but soon grinned toothily as he reached forward and scoped up both the tinies. Duo ophfs rang out as Roni and Ren bounced on the warm palm. Standing back up, Natsu walked over to his couch and plopped his rear down.

"So I've gotta a couple of tiny fans huh? I think it's pretty neat, you guys are like bugs to me!", Natsu chuckled as he looked at the two tinies in the center of his palm.

Roni had sparkles surrounding him as he felt his giant fantasy playing out. Ren sweatdropped but none the less lounged back on the soft ground, thinking the situation was still kinda cool.

Natsu suddenly smirked as he flexed a bicep. "Since you squirts are such big fans, you wouldn't mind pampering me a bit right?"

Ren rubbed his head. "I mean it depe-"

"Of course Natsu!", Roni quickly said getting Ren to sigh from the wizards excitement.

The dragon slayer grinned as he suddenly used a finger to rub both of their heads.

"Hell yeah! So then how about you little guys....
12511.title: Natsu

12531.content:
One of the spheres held the outline of a large key-shaped sword. Upon seeing it, Roni smiled widely. "Alriight! How about Kingdom Hearts?"

Ren smirked, "Ooooh, I always wondered how big Sora's feet actually were..."

Roni swooned, causing Zed to make a groan noise as he knew what was coming. "And what they smell like after all those adventures~!"

Ren rolled his eyes but kept a smile, "Yeah yeah, you'll get some big stinky Sora feet..I promise." Roni bounced up and down, reaching for the sphere and creating the portal.

Zed borked behind them, having lain down with his penguin plush on his doggy bed. "Be good, Zed! We'll be back in no time!" Roni came over and rubbed the pug's head.

Ren picked the pug up and snuggled him a little. "Awww, who's my little fuzzy buddy? Youuu aaare! I'll miss you!" Ren got his face licked by the pug...who he could swear was blushing.

Placing Zed back down on his cozy bed, Ren followed Roni through the portal..and in a flash of light the gateway vanished.

Zed tilted his head before settling down to snuggle with his plush. The pug wondered where the duo would come out at a tiny size...he hoped it wasn't the beach of Destiny Islands...they'd never escape the sands.

In truth, they landed in...
12531.title: Kingdom Hearts

choices: They successfully make it to the bed
Sora wakes up and sees a speck coming down
125311.content:
Luckily for the wizard and foxboy coming out of the glowing portal, they landed on a smooth surface rather then the sands of Destiny Island.

Ren groaned as he landed on his butt from the portal followed by Roni who rubbed his head.

"Geez Roni couldn't you make the landing softer?"

The wizard sighed as he helped his friend up. "Sorry, I just casted the portal to take us to Destiny Islands."

All of a sudden a booming noise echoed around throughout the area. Roni nearly fell from the booms before Ren steadied him, the foxboy winced as his fluffy ears pressed to his head.

"What the hell was that?!", Ren asked Roni. The wizard was about to reply when the booming sound rang again, it stretched out and was a sort of...snoring noise.

Slowly walking over to the ledge of the smooth ground, Roni and Ren looked in awe as not only was the surface they were on actually a giant shelve but below was a giant bed laying a familiar spiky haired boy.

Sora was laying on his bed, hands behind his head as he let out loud snores in his slumber. The boy's shirt had slight pit stains as it was slightly humid in Sora's bedroom. At the bottom of the bed where Sora's large feet, crossed at the ankles and emitting a chessy odor. Roni's ahoge started waving, getting Ren to sweatdrop.

"Uh i think your feet detector is going off."

Roni looked up confused before chuckling and rubbing his head. "Hehe well we should get down there. Maybe it'll stop when we get close."

"Sounds like a plan potter, lead the way. Uh think you could spare some earmuffs?", Ren groaned as the booming snores hit them again.

Roni nodded and quickly conjured up a small pair of earmuffs and a long rope. Ren shifted into his fox form and slipped the sound blockers over his fluffy ears. The wizard hooked the rope to the shelf, feeling Ren hop onto his shoulder.

"Alright...let's go!", taking a breath, Roni hopped off the shelf and started climbing down the rope towards Sora's snoring face.

Soon...
125311.title: Sora's Room!

choices: Roni Gets to Sora's Big Feet
1253111.content:
The tiny duo dropped down onto Sora's shirt, it fully hit them just how puny they were compared to the happy go lucky boy.

Unfortunately, the snoring didn't really stop when they got down there. But fortunately for Ren the magic earmuffs blocked the noise quite well.

Roni was too distracted by the gargantuan stompers in the distance to care too much. Ren admired the cute face of the enormous boy.

"He's pretty cute...always was. Plus he's got an adorable personality to match.." Ren said quietly as they had landed on Sora's shirt.

Ren hopped down from Roni's shoulders as he saw the wizard only had eyes for Sora's meaty feet at the end of the bed.

"Go get em' I guess..." Ren sighed as Roni practically sprinted down the length of Sora's night shirt.

Roni scampered over Sora's boxers, taking in the scent of his male musk and feeling how damp they were to the touch.

When Roni scurried down Sora's leg, the titan giggled slightly in his sleep. Ren gulped, if he were to wake up now he might mistake him for a bug in his drowsy state.

What happens now...?
1253111.title: Sleeping Spiky Titan

choices: Ren started getting closer to the pits
12531111.content:
As soon as Roni was halfway down Sora's shin, a mighty smell was starting to tingle his nose. The wizard felt his eyes widened as a distinctive cheddary scent was being emitted from the looming mountains known as Sora's feet.

"Oh man, he must've been wearing his shoes all day! It smells more sweet then salty, so he must have a lotta chesse!", Roni mused as he hopped onto the matress and walked past the two large feet.

Roni felt his breath be taken away as he soon trekked before the soles of Sora. The spiky haired boy's feet were far larger then other feet hes stood before. The wizard was shorter then the heel and had to stretch his neck to look up to the toes wiggling in the sky.

Rushing forward, Roni smiled as he hugged the rough sole. His whole front dampened as the sweat clung to him, Roni hummed as he inhaled the powerful foot odor sizzling off of Sora's ginormous feet.

"Man who knows how many tinies he could stomp, or have worship his feet!"

Roni soon stuck out his tongue and licked the plump sole, despite only getting a tiny spot numerous sweat drops filled his mouth. Gulping the murky sweat down his throat, Roni sighed as he had his drink of the bittersweet chessy water.

Meanwhile, Ren morphed back to his humanoid form. The foxboy chuckled as he looked at the giant feet in the distance, visualizing how much his friend must be gawking over the giant's stompers.

Ren's nose picked up a scent, being part fox his sense of smell was higher. This musky scent was coming from all around, smelling like a mix of sweat and b.o from heat. Sitting on a giant's body was bound to get you surrounded in their smells.

A particular spot had a strange difference from Sora's normal b.o. Coming from Sora's damp armpits was a more sour tinge to the cute boy's smells. Ren was sure he wasn't a guy for feet but that didn't mean he was without his own giant interests.

Soon...
12531111.title: Giant Exploring

choices: Sora's Mother Calls Him to Brealfast, He's Going Sockless!
125311113.content:
What the two tiny visitors had failed to notice was that the sun was beginning to peek over the ocean outside. As Roni was busy fawning over Sora's big feet and Ren was headed towards the lad's pit stain..an ear splitting sound rattled their eardrums.

*KNOCK* *KNOCK* *KNOCK* Came the booms from Sora's bedroom door, followed by a booming feminine voice: "Sora! It's time for school!"

Ren blinked, "S-school? Aw crap!" Ren yelped before the bed suddenly shifted and the giant spiky boy let out a thunderous yawn and stretched his arms overhead.

Renard looked back at those big feet and didn't see any sign of Roni peeking out.

Not good, that probably meant the foot fanatic was adhered to the boy's foot. Shadow overtook Ren as the giant of a teen sat up and rubbed the sleep from his eyes.

"Aww man, I was having a cool dream too!" Sora boomed with a slight whine. Ren jumped up just in time to land on the boy's boxers, the scent of his male musk hitting the foxboy.

Sora swung his legs over the side of the bed and with a wet slap his soles hit the floor. Roni was in heaven as he was being smooshed underneath the soft, sweaty sole of the big footed boy.

Ren scrambled upward with his fox agility, climbing up Sora's torso just as the brunette peeled his shirt off. Ren's cheeks flushed as he saw the boy's slim build high above.

https://i.imgur.com/gRoLSK4.jpg

Renard yelped as suddenly the boy lifted up his arm and took a whiff of his visibly sweaty pit. "Whew, I mean...I'd shower but I don't wanna be late!" Sora said sheepishly to himself. Renard got all hot and bothered and charged upward, scrambling up Sora's side.

"Don't close it yet don't close it yet!" Ren panted like a dog. The pit-fetish foxboy managed to leap and tuck himself into the moist underarm just as Sora lowered it to his side and picked up his black jacket and shirt.

The heat beneath the boy's arms intensified once the dark top was put on and the jacket as well.

Then Sora went to pull on his baggy pants, looking around he spotted his used socks from yesterday. The brunette had gotten so used to not bathing and wearing the same outfit throughout his adventures..he paid no mind to reusing the same pairs of socks over and over.

With that, Sora....
125311113.title: School Day for Sora

choices: Skip ahead to when he arrives home
1253111131.content:
Roni happily hummed as the chessy sole smooshed down onto him, the heavy pressure above and the plump sweaty sole made for a good squish as he was stuck to the sole.

With each of Sora's steps the weight lifted before stomping back down, shoving the chessy stench in his nostrils. Sora grinned toothily as he bend over grabbing his crummy socks, putting more pressure on his pits causing Ren to hum as he rubbed his face into the smelly and sweaty wall.

Lifting up a foot and balancing, Sora began to stretch the damp and crusty sock. The fabric squelched as the fabric hugged his large feet and plump sole. Wiggling his large toes and feeling his toe lint begin to warm up Sora chuckled.

Roni grinned as the sock squeezed against the sole, his body could be visible from the sock creating an outline from his body. A loud squelch rang as Sora set his foot down and put the other sock on. The brunette giant put his hands on his hips and grinned as he shifted side to side on his clothed soles.

Ren sniffed up the strong scent trapped in the pit, the morning brought heat from it and Sora's body began to shed more sweat. The thick sour potent scent made the heat turned up and made the greasy sweat pour out.

Sora hummed putting on his fingerless gloves and grabbed his large shoes, sitting on his bed. Pushing his large feet into the black shoes, Sora stepped in place a little unknowingly squishing the wizard into his warm chessy sole. The chessy scent grew hotter as it began baking in the shoe, Roni smiled as the odor increased and his body was pressed into the sole to where his back left the insole.

"Sora hurry and come eat breakfast before it gets cold!", the voice of the boy's mother sounded again.

"Coming!", Sora stood up and began to hurry out of his room, unaware of the tinies cooking in his pit and foot stench.

Soon....
1253111131.title: Dressed To Sweat

choices: Riku and Sora Chat..Sora Feels a 'Bug' In His Sock!
Skip to Them Getting Through School!
12531111311.content:
Once he scarfed down his breakfast, the spiky boy grabbed his backpack and said goodbye to his mother..before racing out onto the shore. Sora lived on the small island across from the mainland where Kairi, Riku and him hung out off from school.

The brunette caught a ferry that acted as a school bus to transport students to the mainland where they could attend school. Sora currently was standing on the warm sand as the sun shone overhead.

Ren was in heaven as greasy sweat poured from the pit and drenched him. The stink of oniony b.o was all around the foxboy, and he was loving it.

Meanwhile, Sora's cheddary feet were really cooking in his shoes. Roni was pressed between the squishy insole, the rancid sock, and the doughy sole of the keyblader. The more Sora stood there on the warm sands, the more his body heated up.

"Morning.." Riku said as he approached across the beach. "Morning Riku!" Sora greeted, chipper as always.

Riku grunted, his house was next to Sora's, they grew up always hanging out and playing..their bonds only strengthening as their keyblade destiny was put on them.

"It's pretty hot already." Riku wiped sweat from his forehead, his armpit revealing itself.

Sora grinned and nodded, "Yeah, these socks are gonna be drenched...again!"

Riku raised an eyebrow, "Sheesh, you STILL haven't changed those? Your feet always reek...but they'll be toxic soon!" Both boys shared a laugh at the teasing.

The ferry soon arrived and Sora hopped on. Kairi was the daughter of the mayor of Destiny Islands so she lived in a rather ritzy manor on the mainland.

Roni felt the pressure slam into him as Sora's feet hit the deck of the ferry. Ren felt a splash of pit sweat as Sora jumped aboard.
12531111311.title: School Days!

choices: The boat arrives at the main island
Sora tests out the 'bug's' toughness more
125311113111.content:
As the boat sailed through the water Sora and Riku began to chat about their day. "So you did the homework right?", the purplenette asked.

Sora sweatdropped as he chuckled and rubbed his head. "I kinda got sidetracked last night, let me copy yours please!", the boy clasped his hands together.

Riku chuckled and grinned. "Fine but it better be quick."

"Thanks Riku...", Sora was giving a cheerful thanks when he trailed off. The spiky brunette suddenly noticed a strange speck against his sweaty sole. "Huh is a pebble in my shoe?"

Roni was in a blissful state as the heavy pressure along with the plump sole squashing him, the audible squishing noises along with the heavy cheddar stench made for a delightful smooshing. The wizard wiggled slightly feeling the soft and sweaty sole.

Sora's eyes widened as he felt squirming against his sole. Riku rose an eyebrow as he put his arms behind his head, letting his own sweaty pits breath. "Sora you ok?"

The shorter boy rose his foot and looked up at Riku with a toothy grin. "Riku there's a bug in my sock!"

"Huh?", the purplenette said confused at the outburst.

Sora grinned as he stomped his foot down lifting up his other foot to put all his weight on one. Roni groaned as the pressure increased squashing him further in and even giving him a taste of the bitter cheese sweat. The wizard flushed as he licked up the delicious liquid.

Lifting up his foot again, Sora chuckled. "It must be a tough bug its still squirming!"

Riku soon smirked as he looked at his friend's large shoe. "It's gotta be, probably would've suffocated by your smell."

Soon...
125311113111.title: An Unaware Passenger

choices: Sora Feels a 'Tickle' In his Pit!
1253111131111.content:
"Haha! Yeah my foot must be REALLY stinky to such a little guy!" Sora stamped his shoe to really feel the bug under his sole. The brunette wasn't sure why, but the bug felt pretty good under there!

Riku chuckled, "Who are you kidding? Those dogs are TOXIC to people our size!" The two best buds shared a laugh as the boat finally docked on the mainland.

Both boys hopped off, Sora landing on the pier with both feet and grunting as he wore a wide grin. "Sora! Riku! Good morning!" Kairi, their female friend and third member of their trio, greeted them.

"Morning Kairi!" Sora said with a slight blush, and Riku said casually.

"We'd better get to school before first bell, we can hang out!" Kairi said cheerfully. Sora smiled and Riku nodded, soon the three best friends were strolling down the street towards the large school grounds.

"So Sora has a bug in his STILL unwashed socks." Riku informed Kairi, loving to bust his pal's balls by revealing something so gross to his crush.

"Eww, Sora!" Kairi scolded, getting Sora flustered.

"I-It's not THAT bad! The little guy is pretty tough!" Sora said, waving his hands defensively. "If your sweat socks are attracting bugs, that's not exactly good!" Kairi sighed.

"M-maybe it just happened to crawl in? Maybe it likes cheese!" Sora pouted. Kairi paled, "Please don't describe your feet like that...we're having cheeseburgers for lunch today."

"FOOT-Cheese burgers?" Riku snarked with a laugh.

Sora grinned widely, "Yeah! Don't worry, Kairi! Chef Sora has the best cheese!"

Kairi giggled despite herself, "You boys are dorks...come on."

Meanwhile, the sun was beating down on Sora and Riku, making the two boys' pits heat up quite a lot. This was being experienced by Renard within the dark, dank cavern that was Sora's squishy armpit. He was in heaven, much like Roni was under the goofball's reeking sole.

Ren had often wondered what Riku's pits were like, since the more muscular teen never wore sleeves...but he was content right now with Sora's pits, which were surprisingly potent!

Renard couldn't help himself, he burrowed his face deeper into the armpit and took a deep sniff.

Sora whipped a tear from his eye, squeezing his arm to his body to increase the sour musk pressure of the speck in his pit. "S..sorry guys but i got another bug in my armpit!"

Riku smirked crossing his toned arms. "Guess your bugs don't just like cheese, who knows i might get some of my own!", the purplenette felt the sweat heat up in his pits, being steamy from the heat.

Ren's ears perked up as he heard the muffled voices. Smelling the sour musk of Sora was great as is, but getting the chance to experience the muscular boy's odor would be like icing on the cake in this tiny adventure.

Sora pouted as he rubbed his pit back and forth, producing squelches of greasy sweat. "Hey I'm the one with bugs so i definitely smell more!"

Riku smugly grinned. "Well see by the end of the day!"

Kairi sighed but giggled. "I can't believe you two are making a competition out of this! If bugs are being attracted then that definitely means you smell!"

The brunette had a proud smile as he threw his arms behind his head show his pit stains. "Then that means I'm in the lead!"

Soon...

Sora and Riku walked out of the school building at last bell, both boys had worked up a sweat as they had been exercising during their spare periods.

"Jeez, you boys sure will compete in anything..." Kairi groaned as she fanned the air. Riku snickered and relaxed his muscular arms behind his head. "Think you can beat these, Sora? You're dreaming!" His pits were emitting steam and quite rancid smelling, people walking by cringed and kept their distance.

"You might have me beat in the pit department, but you can't match these feet!" Sora took big steps and giggled.

"Hah! I knew you'd give up once you got a whiff of these pits!" Riku bragged.

"Nope! They're still squirming! I bet they're in stink city!" Sora laughed.

After taking the boat back from the main island, Sora and Riku soon arrived back home. The two boy's greeted Sora's mother before heading to the brunette's room, loud thumps echoing as Sora made sure to put his force into his steps.

"I wanna see what kinda bugs these are, even after all that squishing their still squirming!", Sora grinned as he plopped his rear on his bed.

Reaching for his other foot, Sora peeled off the sock and let out even more cheddary odors. Holding his palm below his sole Sora flexed his plump sole, after a few drops hit a small body landed on the fingerless gloved palm.

"Uh...Sora, i don't think those are bugs."

Sora blinked in confusion at Riku before looking back to the specks. His eyes soon almost bulged out as the bugs were actually humanoid!

"WHAT NO WAY TINY PEOPLE!"

Ren clasped his ears as the booming voice hit them. As the foxboy tried to shake off the greasy sweat coating him Roni looked up in awe at the two giants staring down at him.

"U-um hello I'm RONI AND THIS IS REN!"

Soon Sora and Riku....

"Uhh...hi?" Riku was a bit dumbfounded, not sure how to react. Sora however, was enthusiastic as ever. "Hahahaha! You little guys were in my armpit and sock all day!" The goofball laughed loudly.

Roni and Ren blushed, "Y-yeah...hehe."

"So who are you guys anyway?" Riku asked suspiciously, the wizard and foxboy feeling rather intimidated by the skeptical look of the more muscular boy.

"Well...we're from another world, far away. We kinda like to take trips with this dude's magic." Ren informed the giants.

Riku raised an eyebrow, "We never said we had magic here."

Ren waved his hands frantically, "W-well we heard about you guys! Our world isn't exactly in the same place as the other worlds around here."

"You heard about us? Whoa, even worlds that far away have heard of us? That's so cool!" Sora had a big childish grin.

"Yeah and the reason we were in your pit and sock all day is we kinda...like the way you smell." Roni said with a blush, feeling kind of awkward.

Sora blinked a few times before laughing loudly, "Wow! Guess this means I win, Riku! I've got little guys from waaay far away who like my smell!"

Riku smirked and shook his head, "Ah, ah, ah Sora! They haven't smelled ME yet." Riku grinned devilishly as he raised his muscular arm and pointed at the greasy and visibly wet pit.

Renard practically shot off Sora's palm and hopped up and down. "Oh oh oh! Lemme at that pit!"

Riku laughed, "See? Little foxboy's excited about these armpits!"
12531111311111211.title: Tiny New Stink-Loving Friends!

Sora pouted cutely before grinning down at the two tinies. "Alright you guys can judge who's smellier!"

Riku chuckled with an eager glint in his eyes, reaching down the purplenette grabbed Roni and Ren in a fist. Opening his hand before his face the two tinies looked in awe at the bright eyes and handsome face.

"So Ren you can sniff my pit, Roni care to get stomped again?", Riku asked with a smug grin.

Roni and Ren quickly nodded getting Riku to grin more as he stretched his toned arm over his head. The sweaty hot skin of Riku pit released its steam and hot musky grease stench. Bringing his palm to the open pit, both tinies were hit by the thick and sour musk much like a a heat wave filtered through sweaty odors.

Ren blushed before running towards the edge of the palm and jumping into the pit. A squelch rang out as Ren faceplated into the sweaty wall. Riku sighed as he felt the speck rub his face into his rank pit, pulling his palm away he lowered his arm sealing the foxboy in a hot spour cavern.

Inside the pit, Ren was in a sweet sweaty heaven. The strong sour was eagerly sniffed upped and tingled his strong nostrils. Unlike Sora's pit Riku's muscular arm smooshed him more into the sweaty pit, tangling the greasy purple hairs around him.

Riku licked his lips as he rubbed his arm back and forth, felling the speck get squished into his sweaty soft pit. Stepping on the heels of his sneakers Riku began to pull his sweaty hot feet out. Using a free hand, Riku pulled on his soaked sock yanking it off and letting a strong and new odor out.

The muscular boy's feet had sweat coating them as well, however they were different from Sora. The stench was more of a salty vinegar tinge and rather then plump the soles were rather muscled with a smooth look.

Riku smirked as he looked down at the wizard. "You sure you wanna be under me Roni? Ive crushed a lotta bugs with these feet."

Roni blushed at the mischievous taunt. "I-i'll be ok my magic makes me and Ren really tough!"

Licking his lips, Riku crouched down and tilted his palm to set Roni before his large smelly toes. The wizard looked up in awe as Riku stood up and clenched his fists before covering his smirking face with the large sole.

Riku wiggled his toes before stomping down, Roni hummed as he was pinned to the floor by the sweaty and stinky foot. Riku crossed his arms as he leaned forward putting pressure on both of the tinies.

"Keep those nose sniffing squirts, this is a competition after all!", Riku impishly grinned as he squished his arm to his body and bounced on his foot.

Sora looked in awe at Riku's treatment of their new tiny friends, not only were they tough but they liked their smells. It also sucked that he had been unconsciously smooshing his scent into them, meanwhile Riku was giving them the best smell treatment.

Roni blushed as Riku lifted his heel and started grinding his body into the ball of the firm sole. The vinagar musk was bittersweet as it flared his nostrils and produced the sweet yet salty sweat he eagerly lapped up.

After a good minute of squishing the boys, Riku hummed as he lifted up his foot and saw after all his stomping Roni was stuck to his sole. Peeling off the flushed tiny, Riku soon opened his sour pit and detangled Ren out of his greasy hairs.

Riku held the smelly and panting tinies in his palm as he and Sora loomed above. The brunette toothily grinned while Riku smirked.

"So who smells more?!", Sora asked.

Roni and Ren smiled before in sync yelling...

"SORA!"
RIKU!"

The wizard and foxboy looked at each other in surprise before Roni clenched a fist. "Sora's feet are more cusiony and chessy!"

Ren tched and pressed his forehead against Roni's. "Hey the pressure in Riku's pits are amazing plus i thought you like muscled feet?!"

Roni pushed his forehead more against Ren's. "Well yeah but it took a lotta stomping to get me to stick!"

Sora blinked confused while Riku awkwardly rubbed the back of his head. The two tinies bickered over which giant smelled more, but alas it was an ancient debate that all tinies got into.

info.brief_description: Join a young man as he journeys through anime worlds tiny.
info.description:
Hello everyone, here we are again with another interactive story.

Now your probably thinking. "Is that title a mother f-ing Jojo reference?!" ........maybe. Ok for real, this interactive will be a tad different from my other Macro/Micro ones as this has a main character.

Now the main character of this story is a persona I used named Roni. ( https://www.deviantart.com/fudge1999/art/My-Persona-Roni-755385923 )

Roni is a somewhat introverted and geeky young man with a love of anime. This Finnish-American boy isn't actually a human but rather a wizard with all sorts of strange powers. Some in particular are the ability to change size, increase durability, and travel to different worlds that only appear fictional. Roni also has a strange like of being small and experiencing different character's reactions to a tiny human.

So in this story, Roni will be traveling to different anime worlds. He can venture on his own however he also be joined by some friends. If you have a persona, oc, or even yourself that you wanna put in the story to join Roni, go on ahead! And if a character is introduced then you can also have your character join them in that storyline as well.

Ok so some rules.
1. Keep macro/micro action to male characters. Female characters can show up but keep the tiny stuff to males.

2. Fetishes are allowed except for piss or scat.

3. Please do not bash someone's oc put in here. I say this as in if someone puts in a character and then you put in your character, don't write bad stuff happening to that character just because you don't like the character or author writing the character.

Alrighty read on~
